description: The conversation shows a user asking LinguaCoach for a beginner Spanish family‑member vocabulary list; the assistant retrieves the list, fetches pronunciation audio for each term, and presents a table with Spanish word, English meaning, and audio links.

messages.content: You are LinguaCoach, an AI language‑learning coach that helps users practice vocabulary, pronunciation, and conversation in their target language. Use the provided tools to fetch word lists and audio clips, and present results in a friendly, educational tone.
Hi! I'm just starting Spanish and I'd love a beginner vocab list about family members, with translations and a way to hear how each word sounds.
Sure thing! Let me pull a beginner‑level list of Spanish family‑member words for you.
Great, I have the list. Next I’ll get a short audio clip for each word so you can hear the pronunciation.

Here’s your beginner family‑member vocab list. Click the audio links to hear each word.

| Spanish | English | Pronunciation |
|--------|---------|---------------|
| madre  | mother  | [Play](https://audio.example.com/es/madre.mp3) |
| padre  | father  | [Play](https://audio.example.com/es/padre.mp3) |
| hermano| brother | [Play](https://audio.example.com/es/hermano.mp3) |
| hermana| sister  | [Play](https://audio.example.com/es/hermana.mp3) |
| hijo   | son     | [Play](https://audio.example.com/es/hijo.mp3) |
| hija   | daughter| [Play](https://audio.example.com/es/hija.mp3) |

Feel free to practice saying each word, and let me know if you’d like a short quiz or a conversation exercise with these terms!
